pr_title: Improving error message on autoUpdate mismatch

timeline.message:
Improving error message on autoUpdate mismatch

 - showing the list of pipelines which uses the material in question
 - also showing the id of the config repository - if used

timeline.bodyText: Don't you think method name is mis-leading?
